TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ElementHost extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("WindowsFormsIntegration.Design.ElementHostCodeDomSerializer, WindowsFormsIntegration.Design, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

span.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Usare la controllo di posizionarsi una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] sul [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controllo o form.Use the control to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] on your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form. Per ospitare un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controllare in una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, usare il elemento.To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, use the element. > [!NOTE] > WindowsFormsIntegration. dll viene installato con il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assembly.WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. Il percorso predefinito per l'assembly è %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. Per ospitare un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento in un modulo di Windows, è necessario assegnare il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento per il proprietà.To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a Windows Form, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element to the property. Usare la proprietà da assegnare i mapping personalizzati tra un' controllo e relativo ospitato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.Use the property to assign custom mappings between an control and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Per altre informazioni, vedere [Mapping di proprietà di Windows Form e WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il controllo per ospitare un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Per altre informazioni, vedere [procedura dettagliata: Hosting di un controllo composito WPF 3D in Windows Form](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.

value.span: Se il controllo viene regolata la dimensione per adattarne il relativo contenuto; in caso contrario, .

span.span: if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BackColorTransparent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.BackColorTransparent : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

value.span: Se l'elemento ospitato ha uno sfondo trasparente; in caso contrario, .

span.span: if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il proprietà consente la copia del bitmap, che consente di hosting elementi per l'uso della trasparenza sul contenitore dell'host.The property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container. Ciò è utile quando l'elemento viene spostato su un'immagine o uno sfondo sfumato.This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background. Per motivi di prestazioni il la proprietà è disabilitata per impostazione predefinita.For performance reasons, the property is turned off by default.

summary.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.
The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Può essere ospitato un solo elemento, ma può avere qualsiasi numero di elementi figlio.Only one element can be hosted, but can have any number of child elements. ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il proprietà da assegnare un ambiente host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Per altre informazioni, vedere [procedura dettagliata: Hosting di un controllo composito WPF 3D in Windows Form](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo viene chiamato da parte del pubblico `Dispose` metodo e (metodo).This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`. invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. Se il parametro `disposing` è `true`, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti a cui la classe fa riferimento.When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. Il metodo richiama il metodo `Dispose` di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: può essere chiamato più volte da altri oggetti. Quando si esegue l'override prestare attenzione a non fare riferimento agli oggetti che sono stati eliminati in una precedente chiamata a . Per altre informazioni su come implementare , vedere [che implementa un Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md) Dispose. Per altre informazioni sulle e , vedere [pulizia backup Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) non gestito e [override del metodo Finalize] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void EnableModelessKeyboardInterop(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

param.name: window
param.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

summary.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

span.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks Chiamare il metodo per inoltrare tutti i messaggi della tastiera quando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] finestra viene aperto in maniera non modale.Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly. Il metodo installa un filtro dei messaggi nel [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-applicazione basata su.The method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application. Il filtro inoltra tutti i messaggi della tastiera quando è attiva la finestra non modale.The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HostContainer As Panel
public: property System::Windows::Controls::Panel ^ HostContainer { System::Windows::Controls::Panel ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

span.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
The parent container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il contenitore host è il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , ovvero il contenitore padre per l'elemento ospitato.The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , which is the parent container for the hosted element. Il contenitore host corrisponde sempre alla radice del [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] gerarchia di elementi.The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy. Per accedere all'elemento padre dell'elemento di hosting, accedere a direttamente.To access the parent of the hosted element, access directly.

param.name: e
param.span: The data for the event.

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando viene generato un evento, il gestore dell'evento viene richiamato tramite un delegato.Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. Per altre informazioni, vedere [la gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). Il metodo consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. È la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: Quando si esegue l'override in una classe derivata, accertarsi di chiamare la classe di base metodo in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il implementazione del metodo inoltra all'implementazione della classe base.The implementation of the method forwards to the base class implementation.

span.para: Non eseguire l'override di questa implementazione il (metodo). Il controllo gestisce il disegno del relativo elemento ospitato e override causeranno risultati imprevisti.
Do not override this implementation of the method. The control manages the painting of its hosted element, and overriding will cause unpredictable results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il metodo disegna sfondo del controllo padre in un oggetto HBITMAP.The method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP. Questa bitmap viene utilizzata come sfondo nell'elemento di hosting per supportare la trasparenza.This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency. Questo metodo supporta l'infrastruttura di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

summary.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

span.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se non viene gestito un messaggio relativo ai tasti da ospitato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, viene inoltrato lungo il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] gerarchia per l'elaborazione delle classi.If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

summary.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

span.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

value.span: Oggetto che esegue il mapping alle proprietà di hosting [! Elemento include[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/Includes/tla2sharptla-WinClient-MD.MD)].

span.span: A that maps to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologie hanno due proprietà simili ma diversi modelli.The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models. *Mapping di proprietà* supporta l'interazione tra le due architetture.*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. Per altre informazioni, vedere [Mapping di proprietà di Windows Form e WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il proprietà da convertire le proprietà per un ambiente host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to translate the property for a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Per altre informazioni, vedere [procedura dettagliata: Mapping delle proprietà tramite il controllo ElementHost](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md). [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Select (bool directed, bool forward);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Select(bool directed, bool forward) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Select (directed As Boolean, forward As Boolean)
protected: override void Select(bool directed, bool forward);

param.name: directed
param.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

span.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

param.name: forward
param.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

span.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

summary.span: Activates the hosted element.

span.span: Activates the hosted element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il metodo attiva l'elemento ospitato.The method activates the hosted element. Se è presente più di un elemento ospitato, o il primo o ultimo elemento è attivato, a seconda le `directed` e `forward` parametri.If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters. Chiamate ripetute al (metodo) non scorrono gli elementi di hosting.Repeated calls to the method do not traverse the hosted elements. Per selezionare gli elementi successivi, chiamare il metodo di proprietà.To select subsequent elements, call the method on the property. Questa implementazione inoltra tasti tab dal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
